item.title: Updated Website & New Tool Release
item.description: After going back and forth on website layouts, I think I’ve finally landed. For those of you who visited my previous website (there are dozens of us!), you’ll probably notice a change. I’ve switched from Docusaurus to Hugo with the PaperMod theme. The TLDR is that Hugo is more simple, has a more active theme ecosystem, and fits my use-case better. What does this mean for my website? Well besides the obvious facelift, due to Hugo’s simplicity expect more regular posts from me.
